    • edu.biu.protocols.yao.offlineOnline.primitives.Bundle.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Bundle

    public static class Bundle.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an inner class that builds the Bundle.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Asaf Cohen)
